ccre.ctrl

Class MultipleSourceBooleanController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.ctrl.MultipleSourceBooleanController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanInput, BooleanInputPoll, EventOutput

    public final class MultipleSourceBooleanController
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanInput, EventOutput
    A controller that combines a series of registered BooleanOutputs or BooleanInputs to create a single output or input line. This is a BooleanInput representing the current value, and an EventOutput such that once the event is fired, the output will be correct.
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean AND
      Passed to the constructor to make the inputs be combined in an AND fashion.
      static boolean OR
      Passed to the constructor to make the inputs be combined in an OR fashion.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultipleSourceBooleanController

        public MultipleSourceBooleanController(boolean isAndOperation)
        Create a new MultipleSourceBooleanController, either as an AND operation over its boolean set or an OR operation
        Parameters:
        isAndOperation - if an AND operation should be used. an OR operation is used otherwise. The constants AND and OR can be used for nicer-looking code.

    • Method Detail

      • getOutput

        public BooleanOutput getOutput(boolean dflt)
        Get one BooleanOutput that can be written to in order to update its element of the boolean set.
        Parameters:
        dflt - the default value before anything is written.
        Returns:
        the BooleanOutput that can be written to.

      • addInput

        public void addInput(BooleanInput inp)
        Place the specified BooleanInput as an element in the boolean set.
        Parameters:
        inp - the boolean to include.

      • addInput

        public void addInput(BooleanInputPoll inp)
        Place the specified BooleanInput as an element in the boolean set. Since it is a polling boolean, its value will only be polled when another element changes.
        Parameters:
        inp - the boolean to include.

      • get

        public boolean get()
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInputPoll
        Get the current state of this boolean input.
        Specified by:
        get in interface BooleanInputPoll
        Returns:
        The current value.

      • send

        public void send(BooleanOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInput
        Subscribe to changes in this boolean input's value. The boolean output will be modified whenever the value of this input changes. If available, the current value of the input will be written at this time.
        Specified by:
        send in interface BooleanInput
        Parameters:
        output - The boolean output to notify when the value changes.
        See Also:
        BooleanOutput.set(boolean), BooleanInput.unsend(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

      • unsend

        public void unsend(BooleanOutput output)
        Description copied from interface: BooleanInput
        Unsubscribe from changes in this boolean input's value. This reverses the actions of a previous send call.
        Specified by:
        unsend in interface BooleanInput
        Parameters:
        output - The output to unsubscribe.
        See Also:
        BooleanInput.send(ccre.channel.BooleanOutput)

        Description copied from interface: EventOutput
        Fire the event.
        Specified by:
